name: 3DBall
setup: Multiple platforms where each agent balances a ball by tilting a cube in 3D.
goal: Keep the ball from falling off the platform for as long as possible.

agents.description: Twelve identical agents, each on its own platform, sharing the same policy.

terms: +0.1 each step while the ball stays on the platform.
-1.0 when the ball falls off, ending the episode for that agent.

behavior_parameters.vector_observation_space: Small vector of cube rotation plus ball position/velocity (fewer variables in the hard variant).
behavior_parameters.actions: 2 continuous actions controlling tilt of the platform around X and Z axes.
behavior_parameters.visual_observations: None for 3DBall; a separate Visual3DBall scene uses a camera instead.

float_properties.name: gravity
float_properties.description: Gravity magnitude used in the scene.
